about_the_game:
Is life cruel when cruelty is what makes you feel alive? Nikky never stopped to think about why everyone around her wanted to make her suffer, but she never needed to. The pleasure she derived from use and abuse always was enough for her.
But that was the past, now in the Pain Cage Tournament, her pain exists to please her mistress and all the attendees, the sadistic and powerful elite from all over the world that face off their slaves every year in clandestine fights to see who will have the honor to own the best slave in the world.
Pain Cage Tournament is a fully explicit interactive comic with over 40 pages of adult material, with action and uncensored sex with scenes where the reader can choose what happens next. The different options available allow for re-reading the comic in different combinations, expanding the experience.
Characteristics
- An interactive comic with voluptuous and explicit images in over 40 pages.
- “Choose your own adventure” type options… But PORN!!!.
- Easy to navigate to quickly get to the "favorite" parts
- Original soundtrack, with frames with their respective sound, even in explicit sex scenes.
-Porn with a Story! (we all know how hard it is to find the good ones).

content_descriptors.notes:
This is an interactive comic with explicit bdsm, sex, and violence. In almost every frame, there is nudity, intercourse between consenting adults, bodily fluids, and extreme fetish sexual encounters between the characters. This is ONLY for mature audiences who enjoy SEXUAL BONDAGE AND POWER EXCHANGE FANTASIES...

Buyer beware, this comic contains sexual acts and violence. this app involves topics that some readers may have a sensitivity to, such as sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm, or sex slavery.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP 32
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 7800, AMD HD 4600, Intel HD3000 or similiar
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • VR Support: None
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 560 or higher, AMD Radeon HD 5800 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • VR Support: None

short_description: Welcome to the Tournament Masochistic slaves compete to bring honor and pleasure to their sadistic masters in this fully explicit interactive adult comic. Choose which frame to follow and explore the various options over and over again with just one hand.
